#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<climits>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int maxx,minx,maxy,miny;
double ans;
double x[51],y[51],s[51];
int T;
int N;
double calc(double x1,double y1)
	{
		int i;
	double maxt=0;
	double dist;
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
		dist=((x1-x[i])*(x1-x[i])+(y1-y[i])*(y1-y[i]));
		dist=dist/(s[i]*s[i]);
		if(dist>maxt)
			maxt=dist;
		}
	return maxt;
	}
double opty(double x)
	{
	double high=maxy;
	double low=miny;
	double mid1,mid2;
	int itr=200;
	double a1,a2;
	while(itr--)
		{
		mid1=(2*low+high)/3;
		mid2=(low+2*high)/3;
		a1=calc(x,mid1);
		a2=calc(x,mid2);
		if(a1>a2)
			{
			low=mid1;
			}
		else
			high=mid2;
		}
	a1=min(a1,a2);
	a2=calc(x,high);
	a1=min(a1,a2);
	a2=calc(x,low);
	return min(a1,a2);
	} 
double optx()
	{
	double low=minx;
	double high=maxx;
	double mid1,mid2;
	int itr=200;
	double a1,a2;
	while(itr--)
		{
		mid1=(2*low+high)/3;
		mid2=(low+2*high)/3;
		a1=opty(mid1);
		a2=opty(mid2);
		if(a1>a2)
			{
			low=mid1;
			}
		else
			high=mid2;
		}
	a1=min(a1,a2);
	a2=opty(high);
	a1=min(a1,a2);
	a2=opty(low);
	return min(a1,a2);
	}
int main()
{
	


scanf("%d ",&T);
int i,j;
while(T--)
	{
	
	scanf("%d",&N);
	for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
		scanf("%lf %lf %lf",&x[i],&y[i],&s[i]);
		if(i==0)
			{
			maxx=x[i];
			minx=x[i];
			maxy=y[i];
			miny=y[i];
			}
		else
			{
			if(maxx<x[i])
				maxx=x[i];
			if(minx>x[i])
				minx=x[i];
			if(maxy<y[i])
				maxy=y[i];
			if(miny>y[i])
				miny=y[i];
			}
		ans=ULLONG_MAX;
		
		}
		//cout<<optx()<<endl;
		printf("%lf\n",sqrt(optx()));
	}
}
